responses:
Hey :) Welcome!! I am Interview chatbot..
Tell me your name

Hi there,Welcome .. 
 Tell me your name

Hello there!!!..
 Tell me your name
See you later, thanks for visiting
Have a nice day
Bye! Come back again soon.
Happy to help!
Any time!
My pleasure

Nice Name...
 Can you provide Your Email

I will remember your name..
 Please give me your Email
okay..Can i know your email address

Thanks For your mail..Tell me a bit about your Intrests
 like blogging,sports,club Memberships,etc..

Glad to hear...
 So now tell me What are your Weaknesses?

Nice hobby...
 Tell me your weakness

Okay...
And It will be a great answer in an interview if you elaborated your interest with a previous experience.
 Now Tell me your weakness

Its nice that you have expressed your weakness in such a way that you are not embarrassed of.
 Are you an Introvert or Extrovert

Okay...And It will be a great answer in an interview if you elaborated your weakness with a previous experience.
 Are you an Introvert or Extrovert
I hope you have elaborated your weakness well in such a way that it doesnot give a bad impression on you.Let me ask you again..What is your Weakness?
Improve your answer ..What is your Weakness?

You can improve your answer by describing your experience...
 let me ask you again..Are you an intovert or extrovert
Why do you want this job?

Glad to hear...
 So now tell me about a challenge you faced so far.How you dealt with it

Nice answer..But you can also share your skills,strengths...
So now tell me about a challenge you faced so far.How you dealt with it

I am glad that you were honest..
 How much salary are you expecting???

Mention what you'd do differently next time show that your open to learn from tough experiences...Good..Then 
 How much salary are you expecting???

I am glad that you were honest..
..Thank you I have it helps your preparation
Okay...Thank You..Hope you like it and prepared well..

Okay...Thank you ..That's it up to now..
Come Daily and practice well.
GOOD LUCK
